## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> has a protected destructor to prohibit the user from managing the lifetime of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a> objects.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/context">Context</a> is friend of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a>, and this custom deleter can destroy <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/type">Type</a>.

Definition at line 85 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/context-h">Context.h</a>.
